FuncDef: This command specifies the internal scheduler weight mode.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that queues are equally weighted, except at ingress for mixed-speed LAGs without per-fp-inq-queuing enabled and at egress for all mixed-speed LAGs, in which cases the queues are weighted based on port speed.
Specifies that the queues are always equally weighted.
Specifies that the queues are weighted based on observed offered load.
Specifies that the queues are weighted based on observed offered load capped. by PIR.
